name: Pony Triad
description:
Only playable for 2 players.

This game have some rules of the classic Triple Triad game some original ones.

In this version :

  • Rules are generated randomly for a new game
  • No IA player is implemented in this version.
  • I don't create a tutorial screen for now so if you don't understand a rule, don't hesitate to google it, sorry.
  • Not all the cards of the classic Triple Triad game are implemented for now. I have to find some other pony art in accessible licence (Creative Commons) or some pepole who want to participate on the trip.

Pony arts are from :

  • @EmkayMLP (https://www.deviantart.com/emkay-mlp ) in CC BY-NC 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/ …)
  • @EqPrev (https://www.deviantart.com/equestria-prevails …) in CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/ …)

Feel free to let me any feedback or any suggestions ! ;)

Thanks for playing ! <3
